LanguageData.GU_FarcasterConfirmDeletion: Are you sure? Destination and everything in it will be lost forever. Click again to confirm
LanguageData.GU_SendThingsToFarcastLocationDesc: Send all things in an adjacent Farcaster Pad to the remote location
LanguageData.GU_PlaceNextToFarcaster: The pad must be built adjacent to a Farcaster portal
